title: [FSX] Flight1 - BAT-X
description:
BAT-X by Flight1 Software fixes the unrealistic battery drain times in MicrosoftÃ‚Â® Flight Simulator X and MicrosoftÃ‚Â® ESPÃ¢â€žÂ¢ and Lockheed MartinÃ‚Â® Prepar3DÃ¢â€žÂ¢. The tool will allow you to do full and realistic pre-flight procedures without having to worry about battery drain within the sim.

With BAT-X you'll be able to:
Set up the com and nav radios

Observe gauges that run on electrical power

Enter a complex flight plan into the GPS (often a time-consuming task)

Practice using a GPS or glass cockpit

Listen to the ATIS

Communicate with Ground Control

Test aircraft light
